Title:
A new species of Neoconidiobolus with small primary conidia
from China
Keywords: Neoconidiobolus  Small conidia  Taxonomy  New species
Abstract:
Under the previous study with combined analyses of
morphology and molecular data, the genus Neoconidiobolus is established
to instead of the subgenus Conidiobolus which produces neither
microconidia nor capilliconidia. In this study, a new Neoconidiobolus
species, N. microconidius is described and illustrated herein. It
differs from other Neoconidiobolus spp. by smallest primary conidia.
Molecular analysis based on nucLSU+tef1-a+mtSSU dataset revealed that N.
microconidius is related to N. lachnodes, but the latter produces larger
primary conidia.
